title: Co-Founder & Director of Product Development
description: Lead multi-disciplinary engineering and research team to completely overhaul our innovative concrete sensor to be market ready in 18 months.
Built product team from the ground up spanning embedded firmware, hardware design, machine learning, and full-stack development.
Aligned product development milestones to company GTM strategy by deploying an MVP in 8 states across the US in the summer of 2023.
Transformed management strategy by removing silos to make each member independent and cross-functional which reduced management overhead.

title: Co-Founder & Product Engineer
description: Designed and developed an IoT platform to interface with a novel concrete sensor including embedded firmware, PCB design, and mechanical assembly.
Coordinated with a web application consultant to create a user-friendly dashboard to ensure product user experience and integration requirements.
Conducted field testing on real contrucstion sites to get customer feedback and enhance product reliability.
